headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From MarketAxess’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: MarketAxess delivered slightly higher revenue and profitability in Q3, with management attributing performance to growth in non-U.S. credit markets and ongoing traction with new trading protocols. CEO Christopher Concannon pointed to double-digit advances in international client activity and emerging markets, while noting the U.S. credit segment remains pressured by tight spreads and lower volatility. Concannon acknowledged, “Our current model does exceptionally well in higher volatility when sp
